H0.text: who was the pinkerton detective agency 's first female detective. Allan Pinkerton's Daughter

H1.text: who was the pinkerton detective agency 's first female detective. Frances Glessner Lee

H2.text: who was the pinkerton detective agency 's first female detective. Nellie Bly

H3.text: who was the pinkerton detective agency 's first female detective. Kate Warne

A4.text: Kate Warne was the first female detective in the United States for the Pinkerton National Detective Agency.

A5.text: Pinkerton declared 'It is not the custom to employ women detectives!' but Warne convinced him to hire her as his first female detective.
